markdownRemark.html:
We must speak—blaspheme, if necessary; be accused of being apostates, if that is what is required.

— Mona Eltahawy, Headscarves and Hymens: Why the Middle East Needs a Sexual Revolution.

frontmatter.author: Mona Eltahawy
frontmatter.title: We must speak—blaspheme, if necessary; be accused of being apostates, if that is what is required.
